data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
we hereby inform you that Board of Directors at its meeting held today i.e. Monday 10th November 2025 has considered and approved the Statement of Standalone and Consolidated Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended 30th September 2025.

The Board of Directors at the said meeting has declared interim dividend of Rs.1.50 (75%) per equity share having face value of Rs. 2/- each for the financial year 2025-26. The interim dividend so declared shall be paid on or before 9th December2025 to the equity shareholders of the Company whose names appear on the Register of Members of the Company or in the records of the Depositories as beneficial owners of the shares as on Tuesday 18th November2025 which is fixed as the Record Date  for the purpose of payment of interim dividend in accordance with Regulation 42 of SEBI LODR.

The meeting of the Board of Directors commenced at 03:30 p.m. and concluded at 5.20 p.m.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Schedule III of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015(SEBI LODR) we hereby inform you that Board of Directors at its meeting held today i.e. Thursday 7th August 2025 has considered and approved the Statement of Standalone and Consolidated Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter ended 30th June 2025.

Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI LODR we enclose herewith the Statement of Standalone and Consolidated Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter ended 30th June 2025 along with Independent Auditors limited Review Report thereon.

data.news_body:

data.descriptor: Format of the Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate : Annexure
data.caption: Format of the Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate : Annexure A
data.news_body:
Format of Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate.

Sr. No. Particulars Details
1Name of CompanyNavneet Education Ltd
2CIN NO.L22200MH1984PLC034055
3 Outstanding borrowing of company as on 31st March / 31st December as applicable (in Rs cr) 0.00
4Highest Credit Rating during the previous FY NA
4aName of the Credit Rating Agency issuing the Credit Rating mentioned in (4)Not Applicable
5Name of Stock Exchange# in which the fine shall be paid in case of shortfall in the required borrowing under the frameworkBSE


We confirm that we are a Large Corporate as per the applicability criteria given under the SEBI circular SEBI/HO/DDHS/CIR/P/2018/144 dated November 26 2018. No



Name of the Company Secretary: Amit Buch
Designation: Company Secretary
EmailId: amit.buch@navneet.com
Name of the Chief Financial Officer: Kalpesh Dedhia
Designation: CFO
EmailId: kalpesh.dedhia@navneet.com

Date: 29/04/2025

Note: In terms para of 3.2(ii) of the circular beginning F.Y 2022 in the event of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt securities a fine of 0.2% of the shortfall shall be levied by Stock Exchanges at the end of the two-year block period. Therefore an entity identified as LC shall provide in its initial disclosure for a financial year the name of Stock Exchange to which it would pay the fine in case of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt markets.

data.news_body:

data.caption: Corporate Action-Board approves Dividend
data.news_body: Wednesday, 20th November, 2024 is fixed as the Record Date for the purpose of determining the name of shareholders of the Company to whom the interim dividend of Rs. 1.50 (i.e. 75%) per equity share having face value of Rs. 2 each for the financial year 2024-25 as declared by the Board of Directors at its meeting held on Thursday, 07th November, 2024 will be paid.

data.caption: Intimation Of Record Date Pursuant To Regulation 42 Of The Securities & Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body: It is hereby informed that Wednesday, 20th November, 2024 is fixed as the '' Record Date'' for the purpose of determining the name of shareholders of the Company to whom the interim dividend of Rs. 1.50 (i.e. 75%) per equity share having face value of Rs. 2/- each for the financial year 2024-25 as declared by the Board of Directors.

data.caption: Approval Of Statement Of Standalone And Consolidated Un-Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Half Year Ended 30Th September, 2024
data.news_body: the Board of Directors at its meeting has considered and approved the the statement of standalone and consolidated un-audited financial financial results for quarter and half year ended 30th september, 2024 and declared interim divided of Rs. 1.50 per equity share.

data.caption: Approval Of Statement Of Standalone And Consolidated Un-Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Half Year Ended 30Th September, 2024
data.news_body: the Board of Directors at its meeting has considered and approved the the statement of standalone and consolidated un-audited financial financial results for quarter and half year ended 30th september, 2024 and declared interim divided of Rs. 1.50 per equity share.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Board of Directors at its meeting held today has considered and approved Standalone and Consolidated Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2024 andDeclared interim dividend of Rs. 1.50 (i.e. 75%) per equity share

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body: The Conference Call to discuss the Operational and Financial performance of the Company for Q2 & H1 FY 25 of the Company with Investors and Analysts will be held on Friday,8th November, 2024 at 3:00 PM(IST).

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Board Meeting To Be Held On Thursday, 07Th November, 2024
data.news_body: Navneet Education Limitedhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 07/11/2024 ,inter alia, to consider and approve Meeting of Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Thursday, 07th November, 2024, inter-alia to:1. Consider, approve and take on record the standalone and Consolidated Unaudited financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Half Year ended 30th September, 2024;2. Consider declaration of interim divided, if any, for the financial year 2024-25 and to fix the record date for the same.

data.caption: Intimation Of Resignation Of Shri Tushar K. Jani (DIN: 00192621) And Shri Sanjeev Shankar (Dinl:06872929) As Director Of Indiannica Learning Private Limited, A Wholly Owned Subsidiary Of The Company.
data.news_body: Pursuant to regulation 30 of SEBI LODR, we hereby inform that due to other personal commitments, Shri Tushar K. Jani (DIN:00192621)and Shri Sanjeev Shankar (DIN:06872929) have resigned as Director of Indiannica Learning Private Limited, a wholly owned subsidiary of the Company, with effect from 24th October, 2024 and 25th October, 2024 respectively.
